title: Queue schedule
body:
Hey everyone,

Updated queue schedule below!

**On all the time:
**

Summoner's Rift 5v5 Normal Blind Pick
Summoner's Rift 5v5 Ranked Dynamic Queue
ARAM
Co-op vs AI Summoner's Rift (intro/beginner/intermediate)

**Rotating Game Mode**

Friday: 11:00am - 3:00am AEST
Saturday: 11:00am - 3:00am AEST
Sunday: 11:00am - 3:00am AEST
Monday: 11:00am - 3:00am AEST

**Twisted Treeline
**

Tuesday: 3:00pm - 1:00am AEST
Wednesday: 3:00pm - 1:00am AEST
Thursday: 3:00pm - 1:00am AEST

replies.body:
Back in the pre-season we were promised that Normal Blind would be replaced with Normal Dynamic.

Is this still happening or have we been stabbed in the back on this without being told?


EDIT: Would be really nice to get some more information on this since it's been what, three months without a word?
The problem of having dyanmic, means players need to have atleast 16 champs to play. They could solve this by constantly having 6 free champs and 10 on rotation but they won't

The restrictions could be lowered for Normals, or hell bans could be taken out entirely.

The main point is we need the queuing for position to get rid of the awful shit that is call order which is broken half the time by chat lagging or being blocked from sending messages for no reason upon entering champ select.

> [{quoted}](name=Klavinmour,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=VdoPT9GX,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2016-04-08T11:12:21.506+0000)
>
> The restrictions could be lowered for Normals, or hell bans could be taken out entirely.
> 
> The main point is we need the queuing for position to get rid of the awful shit that is call order which is broken half the time by chat lagging or being blocked from sending messages for no reason upon entering champ select.

So annoying going to call a lane only to get chat blocked just for being quick to send a message. At least they fixed to disparity between chat appearing on your screen before it would appear on everyone's.

> [{quoted}](name=Cyrater,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=VdoPT9GX,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-04-08T11:02:52.019+0000)
>
> The problem of having dyanmic, means players need to have atleast 16 champs to play. They could solve this by constantly having 6 free champs and 10 on rotation but they won't

they should tho, soraka, garen, sivir, ashe, annie, amumu. They've had it sitting there the whole time, just give the people the 450ip intro default champs and stop pretending like anyone is ever using RP for it anymore.
Why not having both like other servers do?

The Dynamic Blind Pick Experience has been ice-boxed until Riot fixes issues the Dynamic Ranked/Draft Experience. That said, they're also working on the new client for us and it probably wouldn't arrive until after the new client is released. 

The Dynamic Blind Pick Experience wouldn't include bans, it'll just add position select at the beginning basically.
It's pointless queue times will just increase because everyone thinks they are faker pro and picks mid because they hate support, can't jungle, thinks Adc mains are piss and hate the top tank meta.

No, queue times are high purely for Mid Laners.

As a jungle my queue times are very quick.
My friend is a support main and instantly gets games, if I play with him our queues are instant again.

The only people to argue against Dynamic Queue for Queue Times are Mid Laners, which is pretty typical of Faker Syndrome.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Hello,

perhaps it would be better if they start at Friday: 11:00am and finish at Sunday: 3:00am AEST (always available between these times)? {{summoner:31}}

> [{quoted}](name=Nearance,realm=EUNE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=VdoPT9GX,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-04-08T09:10:22.060+0000)
>
> Hello,
> 
> perhaps it would be better if they start at Friday: 11:00am and finish at *Monday*: 3:00am AEST (always available between these times)? {{summoner:31}}

Fixed.
Please open 3v3 more often.
We go over the numbers for the queue every evaluation meeting. Right now Twisted Treeline is in a good place, but it hasn't grown to the point of expanding it yet.

Why does riot not implement incentives to play alternative game modes? For example double IP for the first game of twisted treeline or double chance to drop a key fragment on the first game of twisted treeline or rotating queue? One game a day surely doesn't take too much away from summoners rift queue times but at the same time makes the other queues healthier and may even give them a chance of exanding to additional days. 

Also for us twisted treeline players would it be possible to open up ranked on the Thursday instead of normal 3's?   This would at least allow riot to gauge the community's interest in ranked 3v3 as opposed to normals. Riot may get a pleasant surprise.

> [{quoted}](name=Sephyre,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=VdoPT9GX,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-04-11T00:56:57.637+0000)
>
> We go over the numbers for the queue every evaluation meeting. Right now Twisted Treeline is in a good place, but it hasn't grown to the point of expanding it yet.

Maybe it hasn't grown to that point because not enough people are on at the times that you have it on for. Maybe shifting the times around for how long they are available for a trial week or fortnight would see some improvements in player numbers. I for one love twisted treeline. I'm not sure though.
Hey** Sephyre**, are there any updates on Normal Draft pick? The community is dying to know, anything would be awesome :D
Normal Draft is not likely to be opened up anytime soon. That said, we do evaluate for it, and if we grow to the point of being able to support it we would open it up.

> [{quoted}](name=Sephyre,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=VdoPT9GX,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-04-11T00:58:27.786+0000)
>
> Normal Draft is not likely to be opened up anytime soon. That said, we do evaluate for it, and if we grow to the point of being able to support it we would open it up.

I would love normal draft. Maybe remove the bans or reduce the number of bans so that players do not need to own 16 champions. I don't play ranked too much and hate the role call system that we have. Removing bans would help people from being blocked out, and also maybe shifting things around so that some of the time there is normal draft and the rest of the time there is normal blind picks. This would not (hopefully would not) put too much pressure on the servers. Hope you guys read this!
Update for ranked teams? (i see its available right now)
Why have you not brought back Doom Bots?

Would it be possible to open Rotating Queue earlier on Saturday and Sunday specifically? I find every weekend at least one of the two days I wake up at a normal time and decide to play League, only to see the mode isn't up as usual. And then I forget and play something else for hours when I really just wanted to play some silly League.

We have find a match with our friend who had leave buster. We have waited 20 minutes and there were 5 of us after waiting for 20+ minutes a match came and all players accepted the match except one. The one who couldn't accept was not the one with the leave buster.But still we had to wait another 20 minuter because of the one who didn't accept. It is so unfair because we had to wait another 20 minutes while the match was accepted by the player who had leave buster. i think its time to change this unfair method of leave buster. This leave buster method is only wasting our precious time. I think you should not the player have any Ip points any other experience point while he is in low priority. It will be a better way than this. Please consider
? What

I seriously don't think I've launched League to play anything other than 3v3 for the last 6 months. Can we get an update on how long it will be till 3v3 is opened properly or till we'll get ranked 3's?

It's a bit of a joke that in the most popular game in the world we can't have a mode open because 'the queues will take too long'.

If we can't have a draft pick queue for norms, can we get the blind pick using the dynamic queue system please? I'm a sup main wanting to branch out, but continually still get stuck as sup as I'm wanting to learn one new role at a time. If I miss that role (currently mid) I'm back to sup. Constantly blocked for being too quick, I wait so I'm not blocked and I miss the call.
also many ppl only have uder 16 champ because they are saving ip

fuck


{{champion:238}}
Is urf up right now?
